Title: Delivery Drivers / Delivery Executives / Delivery Boys / Fre...
Information:
About the role: 
 As a Zomato Delivery Partner, you are required to pick up food or grocery items ordered by customers from restaurants / outlets and deliver to customers. Delivery boys use their own vehicles (Bike/Cycle) to provide food delivery to Zomato customers. This is an urgent requirement.
 Job type: 
 Full-time: Earn upto Rs. 22,000 per month
 Part-time: Earn upto Rs. 10,000 per month
 BENEFITS: 
 
  Weekly Payments
  Flexible work timings- morning/ afternoon/ evening/ late night
  Referral Bonus
  Joining Bonus
  Insurance Coverage (10 Lac - Accidental & 1 Lac - Health Insurance)
  Attractive incentives
 
 Responsibilities and Duties
 
  Pick and deliver food on time with best service quality
 
 Please note: Before applying, please ensure that you have the following documents: 
 
  Proof Of Address
  Bike/ Scooty (this is not a document)
  DL/RC
  Pan Card
  Bank Document (Cancelled Cheque or Bank Passbook)
  Android Phone (version 4.5 or above)
 
 Open for: 
 
  Freshers job with any degree, fresh graduates, 12th pass or 10th pass.
  Candidates with prior experience in delivery operations are also welcome.
  Our delivery guys need to be hard workers and self starters
  People with field sales or retail helper experience will do great as delivery drivers
  Any working professional who wants to earn good money with a part-time job will also be a good delivery executive
  Candidates who have previous experience as account executives are welcome for these delivery rider roles
  Courier guys are also welcome for delivery person job vacancy
  This is an urgent hiring. Candidates can apply from home.
 
 Job Types: Full-time, Part-time
 Salary: Up to ₹22,000.00 per month
 Schedule:
 
  Flexible shift
 
 Expected Start Date: 27/04/2022

Title: WALK IN - Data Entry Operators
Information:
In office un-paid training for 1 week, then a final interview will be held.5 days working.
 This job is open in our sister concern company, Corp synergy IT services.Skill Set Required
 
  Experience with MS Office and data programs
  Familiarity with administrative duties
  Experiences using office equipment, like fax machines and scanner
  Typing speed and accuracy
  Excellent knowledge of correct spelling, grammar and punctuation
 
 Job Role
 
  Entering customer and account data from source documents within time limits
  Compiling, verifying accuracy and sorting information to prepare source data for computer entry
  Reviewing data for deficiencies or errors, correcting any incompatibilities and checking output
 
 Other Expectations
 
  Staying max. 00:45 Minutes traveling time from office
  Should be stable in job, not someone who has been jumping jobs often
  Should be honest
  Should be open to take additional responsibilities
  Marks should not be below 50% in academics
 
 Job Types: Full-time, Regular / Permanent, Fresher
 Salary: ₹14,000.00 - ₹18,000.00 per month
 Benefits:
 
  Leave encashment
  Paid time off
 
 Schedule:
 
  Day shift
 
 Supplemental Pay:
 
  Quarterly bonus
  Yearly bonus
 
 Expected Start Date: 20/04/2022
